definitions: a short glass tube with a rubber bulb at one end and a tiny hole at the other, for measuring out drops of medicine or other liquids

examples.text: she was so small that she had to be fed with an eyedropper

shortDefinitions: small tube with bulb used to transfer or measure small quantities of liquid

definitions: (in image-editing software) a function enabling the user to copy color from any part of an image

examples.text: use the eyedropper to copy colors in 4 formats
with the use of the eyedropper tool, select another color from your original image

shortDefinitions: function enabling user to copy colour
